name: Angular
desc: Angular (also referred to as 'Angular 2+') is a TypeScript-based, free and open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google and by a community of individuals and corporations.

name: Aurelia
desc: Aurelia is a modern, front-end JavaScript framework for building browser, mobile, and desktop applications. It focuses on aligning closely with web platform specifications, using convention over configuration, and having minimal framework intrusion.
